pages.title: Summon Search Familiar
pages.description: Summons a familiar to find things. Try giving it a $(item)Diamond$().
pages.note: $(t:Requires that the inner 7x7x4-blocks area to be clear of any obstacles or blocks)Requires clear area$(/t)

pages.title: Familiar Summoning
pages.description: Summon your familiar that has been dismissed or killed.
